column3: Perform a group pose, repeating the last executed emote or action on loop. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Text Command: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>/grouppose<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Key Mapping: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> Available

Enable the idling camera. While active, the idling camera will randomly toggle between nearby PCs and NPCs. Executing the command with a PC or NPC targeted will center the camera on that target. Camera position, lighting, and color filter can be all be adjusted in the command settings.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Text Command: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>/idlingcamera<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Key Mapping: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> Available

Enable alarm. Alarms can be set to go off while in game and are deleted upon logout.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Text Command: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>/alarm<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Key Mapping: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> Available

Displays the Command Panel.<hex:02100103>Freely register various actions and commands including mounts, minions, emotes, and gear sets for easy access and execution.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Text Command: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103>/commandpanel<hex:02100103><hex:024804F201F403><hex:024904F201F503>Key Mapping: <hex:0249020103><hex:0248020103> Available
